alert.note: Alert for Shishmaref (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 2:54PM AKST until December 09 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility. Total snow accumulations of 4 inches. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Winds gusting to 50 mph. * WHERE...Diomede. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow will continue through Thursday, and possibly into Friday. The worst conditions are expected early this morning when south winds gust to 40 mph. Conditions might improve briefly this afternoon and evening as winds decrease, but winds are expected to turn north and increase again on Thursday causing a return to low visibility, and those strong north winds and low visibility in snow and blowing snow could last into Friday and even Saturday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
